titles.title: Expressing the sense of Congress that, during this holiday season, peace may prevail in the Middle East.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.

bill.summary: 12/20/2001--Introduced. States that the House of Representatives expresses its: (1) sorrow over the loss of innocent lives in the Middle East; and (2) hope for a time of reflection and a sustainable peace for all parties during this holiday season and for the year to come.
